```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

#### 1. Load packages and data
```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)
setwd("~/Desktop/Organics_Final/Working/R_files/Rmarkdown")
options(scipen = 9999)

raw_sf = readOGR("../R_output/spatial/KernAgOrgs_CDFAOrgs_pest/2017/kernAgOrgs_CDFAOrgs_pesticide.shp") %>% 
  st_as_sf() %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  dplyr::select(-geometry)


# Make 'ACRES*0.405' numeric
raw_sf$ACRES = as.numeric(as.character(raw_sf$ACRES))
raw_sf$HE = raw_sf$ACRES*0.405/raw_sf$N_crps_
```


#### 3. 
```{r top5_crops}

raw_sf$COMM_nw = as.factor(raw_sf$COMM_nw)

crop_fltr_df = raw_sf %>% 
     group_by(COMM_nw) %>% 
     summarise(total_fields = n(),
               org_fields = sum(cdf_kr_)) %>% 
  filter(org_fields > 4) %>% 
  arrange(-org_fields)

top_crops = crop_fltr_df$COMM_nw

top5 = head(crop_fltr_df,5)
top5_crops = as.character(top5$COMM_nw)
top5_crops
```

#### 4. Initialize emptry matrices for organic and conventional crops
```{r initialize_matrices}

O_matrix = matrix(ncol = 8, nrow = 7)
colnames(O_matrix) = c("Ann_KgAI_perH","birds","bees", "mmls","aqsp","reps","soil","avg_fldsz")
rownames(O_matrix) = c("overall","sharedcrops","grape","carrot","orange","lettuce","potato")

C_matrix = matrix(ncol = 8, nrow = 7)
colnames(C_matrix) = c("Ann_KgAI_perH","birds","bees", "mmls","aqsp","reps","soil","avg_fldsz")
rownames(C_matrix) = c("overall","sharedcrops","grape","carrot","orange","lettuce","potato")

```

#### 5. Fill in Organic Matrix
```{r organic_matrix}

raw_df$ACRES = as.numeric(as.character(raw_df$ACRES))

# For all ORGANIC fields
org_df = raw_df %>% 
  filter(cdf_kr_ == 1)

org_df$N_crps_ = rep(1,nrow(org_df))

O_matrix[1,1] = sum(org_df$KgPstAI)/sum(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average Kg AI per acre
O_matrix[1,2] = sum(org_df$KgABrds)/sum(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average kg AI toxic to birds per acre
O_matrix[1,3] = sum(org_df$KgAiBes)/sum(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average kg AI toxic to bees per acre
O_matrix[1,4] = sum(org_df$KgAMmml)/sum(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average kg AI toxic to mammals per acre
O_matrix[1,5] = sum(org_df$KgAAqSp)/sum(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average kg AI toxic to aquatic species per acre
O_matrix[1,6] = sum(org_df$KgARptA)/sum(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average kg AI toxic to reptiles per acre
O_matrix[1,7] = mean(org_df$STORIE, na.rm = TRUE) # Average Storie Index value
O_matrix[1,8] = mean(org_df$ACRES*0.405/org_df$N_crps_) # Average Field Size


# For organic fields that have at least 5 fields with the same crop type
org_df_19 = org_df %>% 
  filter(COMM_nw %in% top_crops)

O_matrix[2,1] = sum(org_df_19$KgPstAI)/sum(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)
O_matrix[2,2] = sum(org_df_19$KgABrds)/sum(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)
O_matrix[2,3] = sum(org_df_19$KgAiBes)/sum(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)
O_matrix[2,5] = sum(org_df_19$KgAMmml)/sum(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)
O_matrix[2,6] = sum(org_df_19$KgAAqSp)/sum(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)
O_matrix[2,4] = sum(org_df_19$KgARptA)/sum(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)
O_matrix[2,7] = mean(org_df_19$STORIE, na.rm = TRUE)
O_matrix[2,8] = mean(org_df_19$ACRES*0.405/org_df_19$N_crps_)

# For Organic grapes
org_df_grape = org_df %>% 
  filter(COMM_nw == top5_crops[1])

O_matrix[3,1] = sum(org_df_grape$KgPstPr)/sum(org_df_grape$ACRES*0.405/org_df_grape$N_crps_)
O_matrix[3,2] = sum(org_df_grape$KgABrds)/sum(org_df_grape$ACRES*0.405/org_df_grape$N_crps_)

O_matrix[3,6] = sum(org_df_grape$KgAAqSp)/sum(org_df_grape$ACRES*0.405/org_df_grape$N_crps_)
O_matrix[3,4] = sum(org_df_grape$KgARptA)/sum(org_df_grape$ACRES*0.405/org_df_grape$N_crps_)
O_matrix[3,7] = mean(org_df_grape$STORIE, na.rm = TRUE)
O_matrix[3,8] = mean(org_df_grape$ACRES*0.405/org_df_grape$N_crps_)


# For Organic Carrots
org_df_carrot = org_df %>% 
  filter(COMM_nw == top5_crops[2])

O_matrix[4,1] = sum(org_df_carrot$KgPstPr)/sum(org_df_carrot$ACRES*0.405/org_df_carrot$N_crps_)
O_matrix[4,2] = sum(org_df_carrot$KgABrds)/sum(org_df_carrot$ACRES*0.405/org_df_carrot$N_crps_)

# For organic orange
org_df_orange = org_df %>% 
  filter(COMM_nw == top5_crops[3])

O_matrix[5,1] = sum(org_df_orange$KgPstPr)/sum(org_df_orange$ACRES*0.405/org_df_orange$N_crps_)

O_matrix[5,7] = mean(org_df_orange$STORIE, na.rm = TRUE)
O_matrix[5,8] = mean(org_df_orange$ACRES*0.405/org_df_orange$N_crps_)

# For organic lettuce
org_df_lettuce = org_df %>% 
  filter(COMM_nw == top5_crops[4])

O_matrix[6,1] = sum(org_df_lettuce$KgPstPr)/sum(org_df_lettuce$ACRES*0.405/org_df_lettuce$N_crps_)
O_matrix[6,2] = sum(org_df_lettuce$KgABrds)/sum(org_df_lettuce$ACRES*0.405/org_df_lettuce$N_crps_)

O_matrix[6,4] = sum(org_df_lettuce$KgARptA)/sum(org_df_lettuce$ACRES*0.405/org_df_lettuce$N_crps_)
O_matrix[6,7] = mean(org_df_lettuce$STORIE, na.rm = TRUE)
O_matrix[6,8] = mean(org_df_lettuce$ACRES*0.405/org_df_lettuce$N_crps_)


# For organic potato
org_df_potato = org_df %>% 
  filter(COMM_nw == top5_crops[5])

O_matrix[7,1] = sum(org_df_potato$KgPstPr)/sum(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)
O_matrix[7,2] = sum(org_df_potato$KgABrds)/sum(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)
O_matrix[7,3] = sum(org_df_potato$KgAiBes)/sum(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)
O_matrix[7,5] = sum(org_df_potato$KgAMmml)/sum(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)
O_matrix[7,6] = sum(org_df_potato$KgAAqSp)/sum(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)
O_matrix[7,4] = sum(org_df_potato$KgARptA)/sum(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)
O_matrix[7,7] = mean(org_df_potato$STORIE, na.rm = TRUE)
O_matrix[7,8] = mean(org_df_potato$ACRES*0.405/org_df_potato$N_crps_)


O_df = round(as.data.frame(O_matrix),3)
write_csv(O_df,"../R_output/CSV/SummaryStatistics/AllOrgs_organic_summary.csv")
```
